namara.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • namara.client.Client

  • public class Client
extends Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Client(String namaraHost, String apiKey)
      Builds a new client for interfacing with Namara Will ping the host with the apiKey to ensure that the connection is valid

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the processed host string for the client

      Performs a query request on Namara and returns all results from the query

      Tests the namaraHost and apiKey to ensure that they can connect with the instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(String namaraHost,
              String apiKey)
        Builds a new client for interfacing with Namara Will ping the host with the apiKey to ensure that the connection is valid
        Parameters:
        namaraHost - The host name that will be connected to
        apiKey - The API Key for the connecting user

    • Method Detail

      • testConnection

        public boolean testConnection()
                       throws AuthorizationException,
                              ConnectionException
        Tests the namaraHost and apiKey to ensure that they can connect with the instance. If connection is successful, returns true. Otherwise, errors will be raised containing details.
        Returns:
        true if the client is authorized
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - when API Key is not found or not valid for a user at that host
        ConnectionException - when namara host can not be reached

      • query

        public org.json.JSONObject query(String queryString)
                          throws AuthorizationException,
                                 ConnectionException,
                                 QueryException
        Performs a query request on Namara and returns all results from the query
        Parameters:
        queryString - - query to issue to namara
        Returns:
        The resulting collection of records
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - - when unable to authorize client for namara
        ConnectionException - - when unable to connect to namara
        QueryException - - when unable to build or execute query on namara

      • getNamaraHost

        public String getNamaraHost()
        Gets the processed host string for the client
        Returns:
        The host name
